title: Hi, I'm Kismath, a problem solver, a dreamer, and a developer.
quickDescription: Looking to bring innovation to your next project? Let's create something great together. Here, I present my varied projects, demonstrating my versatility, rigor and ability to create captivating user experiences.

skillsAndExperience.title: My Skills & Experiences
skillsAndExperience.description:
I hold a Master's degree in Computer Engineering from Sorbonne University, completed through a two-year apprenticeship at Bien’ici as a full-stack developer. There, I developed innovative 3D digital solutions for real estate promotion.

I specialize in front-end development, crafting modern, responsive websites using JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, React, and HTML/CSS, while also having experience in back-end development with Node.js and Python.

Proficient in database management and cloud computing, I am a quick learner who thrives on challenges and is committed to delivering clean, maintainable code and exceptional user experiences.

allaboutMe.title: All About Myself
allaboutMe.intro: I’m a Software Engineer located in France. I have a serious passion for UI effects and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. User satisfaction is a must for me.
details: I'm a detail-oriented problem solver who loves tackling challenges with precision and creativity.
Passionate about fitness and boxing, enjoying adventures outdoors with friends, binge-watching the best TV series, and diving into the world of English literature.
And I'm interested in the entire creative frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.
